pageContext.claim: “Biden said, ‘I never met the people, never met the gentleman.’ Unfortunately, in about 10 seconds, a picture came out where they're playing golf together, but he never met him.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden never made this claim. His son, Hunter Biden, sat on the board of a Ukrainian natural gas company named Burisma. Biden said he never discussed the matter with his son. The picture Trump is referencing shows the Bidens golfing with Devon Archer, who is Hunter Biden's longtime business partner.
